/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, the iconic Temple of Heaven can be seen, adding a touch of historical significance to the modern cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye towards the horizon.
